main event: A civilian truck driver reported seeing a bright, round light in the sky while driving near Oxford, Wisconsin on February 20, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2 minutes before it ascended rapidly and disappeared., The light was described as being as large as the full moon and glowing from within with color changes from white to orange to red., The object made no sound during the sighting., The observer mentioned other incidents of similar sightings in the past., No physical evidence was found to explain the sighting.
witness description: William M. Sheldon, a 48-year-old male truck driver
